alert.note: Alert for Gove (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 7:13PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Gove County through 745 PM CDT... At 712 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles west of Gove, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gove around 725 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Grainfield. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 88 and 101. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
